name: fetch-utils
description: Modern client request sending method - Fetch, both work for node and browser.

scripts.test: babel-node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha test/  --report lcovonly -- --recursive -R min --check-leaks --require babel-core/register && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Lucky Zhou
